sentences.en: A few years later, Katya succumbed to cancer in London.
sentences.cn: 几年后，卡佳因患癌症在伦敦病逝。

sentences.en: A lot of cancers can now be treated successfully.
sentences.cn: 现在许多癌症可以治愈。

sentences.en: a new treatment which effectively kills cancer cells
sentences.cn: 一种能有效杀死癌细胞的新疗法

sentences.en: Britain has an enviable record on breast screening for cancer.
sentences.cn: 英国妇女的乳腺癌患病率很低，着实令人羡慕。

sentences.en: Calcium may aid in the prevention of colon cancer.
sentences.cn: 钙可能有助于预防结肠癌。

sentences.en: Cancer of the breast in young women is uncommon.
sentences.cn: 乳腺癌在年轻女子当中并不常见。

sentences.en: Decaffeinated coffee still contains some stimulants and other nasties linked with cancer.
sentences.cn: 脱咖啡因的咖啡仍含一些刺激物和其他可能致癌的有害物质。

sentences.en: He died of cancer last month.
He had kidney cancer, with secondary tumours in the brain and lungs.
sentences.cn: 他患有肾癌，还有脑部和肺部的继发性肿瘤。

sentences.en: He was eventually diagnosed as suffering from terminal cancer.
sentences.cn: 他最终被诊断出患了晚期癌症。

sentences.en: It is a cancer that can be cured with relative ease.
sentences.cn: 这是一种相对来说比较容易治疗的癌症。

sentences.en: Jane was just 25 when she learned she had cancer.
sentences.cn: 简得知自己罹癌那一年才25岁。

sentences.en: Liver cancer is linked to the hepatitis B virus.
sentences.cn: 肝癌与乙肝病毒存在关联。

sentences.en: Sadly, both he and my mother died of cancer.
sentences.cn: 非常不幸的是，他和我母亲都死于癌症。

sentences.en: Scientists claim to have identified natural substances with cancer-combating properties.
sentences.cn: 科学家们声称已经发现自然界的某些物质具有抗癌特性。

sentences.en: Scientists know that cancer may not show up for many years.
sentences.cn: 科学家们知道癌症可能会潜伏多年。

sentences.en: She attended a cancer support group at her local hospital.
sentences.cn: 她参加了当地医院的癌症互助组。

sentences.en: She was told last year that she had cancer .
sentences.cn: 去年她得知自己患了癌症。

sentences.en: The tissue is examined microscopically to rule out or confirm cancer.
sentences.cn: 利用显微镜检查组织，以排除或确认癌变。

trans.tran_en: a very serious disease in which cells in one part of the body start to grow in a way that is not normal
